item.title: [Python][Class] __str__ v.s. __repr__
item.description: object._ _ str _ _(self) Purpose[Readability]: return a string which is a more convenient or concise representation can be used. object._ _ repr _ _(self) Purpose[Unambiguous]: return a string which should look like a valid Python expression that could be used to recreate an object with the same value (given an appropriate environemnt). If _ _ repr _ _ is defined, and _ _ str _ _ is not, the object will behave as though _ _ str _ _= _ _ repr _ _.
